docs.snippet: The family behind Tabasco sauce, which is made about 150 miles west of New Orleans, has deep ties to sports....
docs.lead_paragraph: The family behind Tabasco sauce, which is made about 150 miles west of New Orleans, has deep ties to sports.
docs.abstract: McIlhenny Co, makers of Tabasco sauce, may get an extra bump in sales because Super Bowl is in New Orleans, where Tabasco has a strong presence; Tabasco factory on Avery Island, about 150 miles west of New Orleans, has been producing 750,000 bottles daily and has created a commemorative bottle for Super Bowl XLVII.

headline.seo: New Orleans’s Ties to Tabasco Hot Sauce Maker Burn Deep
headline.main: Tabasco’s Ties to Football Burn Deep
headline.print_headline: Tabasco’s Ties to Football Burn Deep

docs.snippet: Time will tell if Thomas Tull, one of the most successful walk-on players in movie history, really is the latest outsider to win an insider’s game through his company, Legendary Entertainment....
docs.lead_paragraph: Time will tell if Thomas Tull, one of the most successful walk-on players in movie history, really is the latest outsider to win an insider’s game through his company, Legendary Entertainment.
docs.abstract: Profile of Thomas Tull, founder of Legendary Entertainment, who has risen to top ranks of Hollywood finance despite his origins as an outsider; Legendary is at crucial juncture as it prepares to release six major films in summer season.

headline.seo: Thomas Tull of Legendary Entertainment Faces a Critical Juncture
headline.main: Film Financier Faces a Critical Juncture

byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES and MICHAEL CIEPLY
